decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, undated, received 19/08/13; Existing Elevations, undated, received 19/08/13; Existing Ground Floor Plan, undated, received 19/08/13; Existing First Floor Plan, undated, received 19/08/13; AUG/13/03A, dated Sept 13, received 27/09/13; and AUG/13/03A, dated Sept 13, received 27/09/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extensions hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as No. 526 Great West Road, Hounslow, TW5 0TQ.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension and single storey rear extension to the house
